replies.body: Why is the "your snowdown shop" not open yet?

Hey there, Your Snowdown Shop is currently experiencing issues. We are working to get this fixed ASAP.

EDIT: Confirming that we're rolling this out to stores server by server, and discovering/fixing any issues along the way. This roll out will continue and Your Snowdown Shop will come to OCE ASAP.

Would it be possible for us to receive a notification when the snowdown shop is rolled out to the OCE server?
Will we need to restart our client to have access to it?

When it does go live I will reply again here.
I can't be sure but my hunch is that you may have to restart the client for it to appear. I do know that we expect it to go live in OCE very soon.

Sorry guys. We've got a team working on this all night but I've not gotten any new info yet. I do believe OCE was the next region to receive the Snowdown Shop. I'll try to give one last update before I log off for the night.

UPDATE EDIT: As of 12:45 AM AEDT, Snowdown Shop is still experiencing issues and will remain offline for at least a few more hours, possibly extending well into the day. We want this feature to be as good an experience as you'd expect, so thank you for your patience as we try to get it online and working correctly.
Just saying the way you guys handle things is extremely disappointing, What is Riot OCE doing all day?

Thanks for the updates Gehirn, I know you're experiencing a lot of negative feedback, but thanks for keeping us in the loop. :)

~~Are people working on it overnight? Is there some chance that it will come up some time tonight or is work going to resume some time in the morning? ~~
 Obviously you can't give us definite time frames, but do you have a **ROUGH** idea that is **completely likely to change and shouldnt be taken as word of God** ?

Thanks again for all of your help

EDIT: I should learn to read...
"very soon"
we should get some more deals to compensate for this???
Probably not. The snowdown shop is open for something like three weeks, so anybody who is trying to get their deals now, most likely has time to access it again sometime before it ends
can we get an extension on the end date of our snowdown shops to compensate for the amount of time we're missing these shops?

Im starting to get worried. Even Surrender@20 Responds faster then the workers of RIOT...and Moobeat isnt even a qualified Riot Employee.. Is he?


Russia has SD Shop...

Legendary Snowball:

Today is the 23rd and the snowball skin should be working. 

But I bought a legendary skin and I didn't get a mystery skin. So I went to refund it thinking that it started at 18:59 AEDT but I reread the information about and it said "From December 23 until January 8 at 18:59 AEDT. Then I read on and it says "We are disabling refunds on Legendary and Ultimate skins while Legendary Snowball is going on." 

So is it working or not?? Can I get my refund points back please cos in the first place I wasn't supposed to be allowed a refund on the legendary skin? Please help

Hey riot. It says "From December 23 until January 8 at 18:59 AEDT, whenever you buy or are gifted a Legendary or Ultimate skin, you’ll get a free Mystery skin". I got a Final Boss Veigar skin this morning which is already 23rd of December but didn't get the mystery skin. The deal starts from 23rd of December but it doesn't specify the exact starting time which confused me.
Same thing happened to me {{item:3070}}
Same here{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
i bought the dragon trainer and got nothing mate
I bought a legendary today (23rd) and I didn't get the mystery snowball, anyone else have this happen to them? pls fix

Please say what timezones please, many OCE players are from Australia so when u say a date its nromally the next day. I brought a legendary skin today and didnt get a mystery skin :( all because it said 23/12{{item:3070}}

WELL I AM EXTREMELY HAPPY THANKYOU!
I Decided to try out this ultimate/legendary purchase spree and guess what I GOT!
I decided to purchase omega teemo because I needed a skin for teemo.
AND I GET NUNU BOT AND SPIRIT GUARD UDYR! WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
ANNND A shitty garen skin... but UDYR BABY WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

hi riot, at the start of this month you said you will open the snowball on the 23rd of December.(i screenshot it) however, today in the afternoon I bought the dragon trainer tristana and I got nothing. why is that, hope you can deal with it. 23rd of December does't mean at night right?
I just bought Dragon Trainer Tristana and I didn't get a free Mystery Skin?!?! Can someone help me out?
yo man, i wait 2 weeks for the snowball but im in the same situation.
i brought surprise party{{champion:9}}  and didnt get mystery
Surprised party fiddlesticks is not a legendary skin

> Surprise Party Fiddlesticks and Primetime Draven, while priced as 975 RP, are legendary skins and are part of the Legendary Snowball. They're permenantly discounted as a thanks to players.

[Source](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oixW2ira-faq-legendary-snowball-december-23rd-january-7th)

Sorry to disappoint but, In the store, toggle 'Legendary' skins and you will also see Surprise Party Fiddlesticks, and Prime-time Draven 

They are the only 2 Non-1820rp skins that are Legendary... So Far {{champion:9}} {{champion:119}}
Did they take away the bonus RP thing or am I blind?
I bought a legendary skin but didn't get the bonus skin?
Hi!

I refunded a legendary skin on the 23rd thinking that the mystery skin snowball hasn't started yet and it's best to buy it when it actually does start. I read above that we can't even refund when the mystery snowball starts but the shop let me anyway. 
I come back 3 days later and I'm gifted with a mystery skin and when I went to re-buy the skin I originally refunded, it won't let me buy it. 
Can you please fix this? I just want my final boss veigar skin :(

i know this is out of topic but plz pretty plz plz can u guys give me some free RP..... i just need 14 more and i can get silent night sona ;-; i really wanted it but after buying a skin from mystery discount i didnt have enough >.< plz....

I just bought final boss veig (25th, Murry Xmas) but no mystery skin ?? Is there something we have to do to make that happen or what?
Super confused and sad {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Why did my snowdown shop disapper after i restarted the league of legends client
YOUR SNOWDOWN SHOP is closed early ;-;
I just bought heartseeker Vayne but didn't get the bonus skin?
i bought omega sqaud {{champion:17}}  but i didnt get the mystery skin

will u get the free poro icon from last year if u play poro king this year

I got Corporate Mundo yesterdey............
Wow I bought a legendary skin late at night on the 22nd. I guess no skin for me
URF is all I need.
i brought surprise party{{champion:9}} and didnt get mystery

sorry mate 
LEGENDARY SNOWBALL
_**23/12 - 8/1**_
When you buy or receive a Legendary or Ultimate skin this Snowdown, you’ll unlock a free Mystery skin! If that Mystery skin happens to be a Legendary or Ultimate, it unlocks another Mystery skin and can continue to snowball from there. As an added bonus, we’re doubling your chance to unlock a Legendary when you receive each Legendary Snowball Mystery skin.

Surprise Party Fiddlesticks counts as a legendary skin

[source](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oixW2ira-faq-legendary-snowball-december-23rd-january-7th)

for the self mystery gifting the date on the title is different as the date in the content. And that's the reason why i felt so strange that can't find the mystery gifting in the shop. Feeling really upset.{{summoner:31}}
How come the Snowdown Shop is off again? I saw it yesterday. {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

The personalised Snowdown Shop really did not entice me at all. I was REALLY disappointed. I haven't been able to play much recently, and my "personalised selections" were a bunch of skins for champions I do not even own. There was one skin for a champion I own, but it is one of the skins that I find horrific and would never purchase. Sadly, this is an Epic Fail in my case this Snowdown season.
